#summary List of functions supported by the Google Refine Expression Language (GREL)

<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

Function invocation in Google Refine expression language has 2 forms:

  * `functionName(arg0, arg1, ...)`
  * `arg0.functionName(arg1, ...)`

The second is a shortcut to make expressions easier to read. It's only syntactic sugar.

===Functions by Type===

  * [GRELBooleanFunctions GREL Boolean Functions]
  * [GRELStringFunctions GREL String Functions]
  * [GRELArrayFunctions GREL Array Functions]
  * [GRELMathFunctions GREL Math Functions]
  * [GRELDateFunctions GREL Date Functions]
  * [GRELOtherFunctions GREL Other Functions]
